titleStmt.title: The vvhore of Babylon As it was acted by the Princes Seruants. Written by Thomas Dekker.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [at Eliot's Court Press?] for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: Title page in red and black. Variant: title page all in black.

Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
